sentences.sContent: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.sCn: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

sentences.sContent: ...She does not think it's necessary to stay home every day with the children and she knows a very reliable baby-sitter who's willing to come to her house...
...She does not think it's necessary to stay home every day with the children and she knows a very reliable babysitter who's willing to come to her house...
...the most user-friendly or the most reliable products in a particular field...

remMethod.val: reli(看作rely， 信赖) ＋ able(能…的) → 可靠的

trans.tranOther: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on
